summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a powerful and stylish device that offers a 5.7 inch HD display, a powerful quad-core processor, a 16MP rear camera, dual SIM capability, a Fingerprint Sensor, support for wireless charging, and up to 10 hours of talk time and 18 hours of music playback. Customers can take advantage of free shipping on orders over $50, discounts when purchasing multiple phones at once, and various financing options. The phone also comes with a one-year limited warranty and an optional extended warranty program. Accessories such as cases, screen protectors, chargers, earphones and more are also available for purchase.
